description: This table contains information about the generic verification (HVR) record.

columns.name: VERIFY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the verification record

columns.name: REC_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Record status flag special item. Indicates whether the verification record is active, deleted, hidden, or a combination of statuses.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive


Deleted


Inactive and Deleted


Hidden


Inactive and Hidden


Deleted and Hidden


Inactive Deleted and Hidden

columns.name: VERIFY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category value representing the type of verification performed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Anesthesia

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient associated with the verification record.

columns.name: PAT_CSN_ID
columns.description: The Contact Serial Number of the patient encounter the verification was performed within.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: Surgical log ID for this verification record.

columns.name: VERIFY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who performed the verification

columns.name: VERIFY_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant the verification was performed
